# This command takes the currently selected word and # displays the python documentation for the module # corresponding to said word. # # It falls back on the current word. # change to /tmp to avoid possibly overwriting # an html file in the working directory. cd /tmp : ${TM_SELECTED_TEXT:=$TM_CURRENT_WORD} pydoc -w "$TM_SELECTED_TEXT" >/dev/null if [[ -f "$TM_SELECTED_TEXT.html" ]]; then cat "$TM_SELECTED_TEXT.html" rm -f "$TM_SELECTED_TEXT.html" else echo "

No documentation found for:

$TM_SELECTED_TEXT

This command only looks for Python modules." fi
